snippet.title: DEAD OR ALIVE 6 - The Lightning Technomancer
snippet.description:
NiCO is the second original character to make her debut in DEAD OR ALIVE 6. The new character was on display for the first time this past weekend inside the DEAD OR ALIVE Festival in Tokyo.

NiCO, known as “The Lightning Technomancer” is a practitioner of Pencak Silat, a historic martial art of Southeast Asia. She employs powerful plasma discharges in her attacks, boosting her Pencak Silat strikes to another level, while at the same time using her EMF Rings to move at ultrahigh rates of speed.

Joining NiCO in the latest reveal is Helena’s half-sister, Kokoro. A master of Ba Ji Quan, Kokoro uses a combination of elbow and palm thrusts to compliment an array of throws aimed at destroying her opponent’s balance. Graceful, yet powerful, Kokoro’s fighting style incorporates the hard and soft elements that represent the spirit she has refined through her maiko training. 

Also returning is La Mariposa, who excels at aerial attacks, also known as “The immortal butterfly”. Under the mask, however, the professional wrestler is really Lisa Hamilton, who was a DOATEC researcher, at one time conducted experiments on the ninja Hayate, and although it was rumored that she had retired after the 5th Tournament, La Mariposa is back, deadlier than ever.  

[New Stages]
Zero - A research facility built by M.I.S.T. highleted by shattered glass and freefalls.
MIYABI | The Hidden Garden - A quiet Japanese town surrounded by bamboo. Break through the thicket and watch as fighters crash down into a secluded spot known as The Hidden Garden.

**Pre-orders** across all systems are now underway. For the latest pre-order information, including a description of all pre-order and early purchase bonuses, please visit our official website at https://teamninja-studio.com/doa6/us/products.html 

Follow us here:
[official Facebook] https://facebook.com/Deadoralivegame
[official Twitter] https://twitter.com/DOATEC_OFFICIAL
[official Twitch] https://twitch.tv/Deadoralivegame
#DEADORALIVE6 #NiCO #Kokoro #Lisa #Raidou
